api_list.description: Simplify your email management with our API that detects and handles bounced emails from a range of ISPs, ensuring your messages are delivered effectively.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://emailbounceapi.p.rapidapi.com/email/mike.2023@gmail.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emailbounceapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://emailbounceapi.p.rapidapi.com/email/{email_string}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emailbounceapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
